title: Surf Instructor
description: Was tasked with teaching surf lessons to individuals of all skill levels and ages. Provided safety instructions, such as how to identify potential hazards and how to navigate the ocean safely. Taught fundamental surf techniques. Tailored each lesson to the specific needs and abilities of each student.

title: Peer Advisor
description: Provided indispensable front-line support to a diverse student population, including both four-year students and transfer students. Assisted with class enrollment, graduation planning, petitions, and more, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and knowledge of the engineering school. Additionally, directed both students and visitors to appropriate school departments and faculty, making a positive impact on the academic journey of all. Utilized excellent communication and interpersonal skills to ensure that all were connected to the resources and support they needed.

title: Maintenance Worker
description: Was responsible for ensuring that the dorms and other campus buildings were in good repair. This involved performing repairs in dorm rooms, maintaining various plumbing systems, responding to maintenance requests from students and staff members, and maintaining records of all maintenance work performed.

title: Programs Assistant
description: Planned and executed a variety of events for the Rachel Carson College community. Developed and implemented event concepts, including those with environmental themes and cultural celebrations. Demonstrated strong organizational and project management skills while bringing ideas to life and positively impacting campus life.

company: Club Ed Surf School and Camps
title: Surf Instructor
description: Taught surf lessons to individuals of all ages and skill levels. Tasks included providing safety instruction, teaching fundamental surf techniques, tailoring lessons to the specific needs and abilities of each student, maintaining equipment, and assisting with the transportation of these items to and from the Club Ed Office.

title: Skateboarding Instructor
description: Managed individualized lessons tailored to each student's needs and abilities. I provided safety instruction, promoted proper gear usage, and utilized hands-on teaching methods to help students progress in their skateboarding skills while fostering a positive and inclusive learning environment.
